attributes.additional_details: The economy booms during Halloween. It is the busiest time of year for some businesses. For pagans it is their biggest festival of the year, (Sahmain), bigger than Christmas. Stop this locking down madness. Think of peoples' long term mental health
attributes.background: Simply stop the Halloween lockdown. The economy booms during Halloween. It is the busiest time of year for some businesses. For pagans it is their biggest festival of the year, (Sahmain), bigger than Christmas
